---
title: Beregovkski's Metadata
---

```{r, echo=F, warnings=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(DT)
df <- read.csv("data/beregovski-metadata.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE)
df <- df |> clean_names()
df <- df |>  select(!c(mode, secondary.modes, modulation_measures, one_mode, mode_notes, original_tonality, original_tonality_directional, modulation_criteria, additional_notes))
df |>          
    datatable(filter="top", rownames=FALSE)

## to-do

```
